verbs.description: [V: remembering] [ARG1: the the obama white house halloween parties] yes there was a time not too long ago when the white house and its lawns would reverberate on halloween day to the sounds of friendly ghosts and goblins mixed in with cheers and happy faces of children parents and the distinguished fun - loving and book lovers dmca kos liberation league senate brian p kemp barack obama obama georgia brett kavanaugh florida pittsburgh brian kemp senator kos kos media gop
